attributes.action: Drivers. Prove you don't see us.
attributes.additional_details:
In the vast majority of cases where a motorcycle is involved in an accident the driver of the other vehicle is at fault.  The same excuse is also used by the drivers.  Sorry I didn't see him.
Should this be the case, a driver using this excuse should have his licence suspended until an eye test has taken place to prove he/she is fit to drive.  If failed a bann should be enforced if passed, A charged of driving without due care and attention should be the minimum given to the driver.
